Class FerryRoute

java.lang.Object
  Route
      FerryRoute

public class FerryRoute
extends Route

This class inherits from the Route class and implement ferry routes. It will keep track of how many locomotives that are on the route as well as the length of the route, the color of the route, and the two cities that are connected by the route.

Version:
April 15, 2013
Author:
Chan Tran, Dan Egan, Damian Crisafulli, Andrew Reynolds, Matt Brancato

Constructor Detail

FerryRoute

public FerryRoute(City c1,
                  City c2,
                  int lng,
                  Color c,
                  int loco)
This constructor will set up a ferry route. It uses the arguments from the parameters in order to set up the ferry route.

Parameters:
c1 - the name of first city
c2 - the name of second city
lng - the length of the route
c - the Color on the route
loco - the number of locomotives on the route
Method Detail

getLocomotives

public int getLocomotives()
This method will return the number of locomotive on the route.

Returns:
the number of locomotives on a route
